conversation.message: I am highly enthusiastic about the opportunity at Company D. Your mission strongly aligns with my professional background and long-term goals. I formally submit my application and look forward to contributing immediately.

2. Company D's priority list is ['Seeker_A', 'Seeker_C', 'Seeker_D', 'Seeker_E', 'Seeker_B']. I am the second most preferred candidate.

If Seeker_A applies to Company_E (their top choice), Company_D might receive applications only from lower-ranked candidates or from me (S_C). Given my high rank for Company_D and its status as my top preference, I will submit a formal application immediately to maximize the chance of securing this match in the first round.
